articles.author: Fox Business
articles.title: Florida-bound American Airlines plane drops 15,000 feet in 3 minutes: 'It was terrifying' - New York Post
articles.description: A University of Florida professor on the plane called the incident ‘terrifying.’
articles.content:
An American Airlines plane headed to Florida dropped over 15,000 feet in a matter of three minutes, flight records indicate.
American Airlines Flight 5916 on Thursday took off from Charlotte, North … [+1869 chars]
